professional_experience.title: Software Developer
highlights: Architected an Electron-based desktop suite to control liquid handling stations, facilitating real-time bidirectional communication with machine firmware via high-performance STOMP WebSockets.
Streamlined machine telemetry storage by syncing local data points to AWS RDS via Hibernate, achieving 20% faster query execution through indexed mapping.
Deployed a real-time monitoring dashboard on AWS EC2, centralizing protocol access and user-specific analytics with 35+ metrics.
Developed an intuitive protocol designer in Electron, enabling users to program complex liquid handling sequences with a 95% reduction in setup time via reusable templates.

professional_experience.title: Software Developer
highlights: Engineered a Spring Boot backend for construction management, automating 12+ project milestones and reducing manual data entry by 33% through centralized stage tracking.
Streamlined payment by engineering a milestone-based 3-layer system with automated provider fallback logic.
Built a high-performance React dashboard using optimized state management, resulting in a 40% faster initial load time for complex project financial summaries as recorded in lighthouse.
Strengthened data security by implementing Spring Security RBAC, standardizing access controls across 5+ user roles to prevent unauthorized data exposure.

professional_experience.title: Software Developer

Designed and deployed the 1Ludo Cash Application launch website using ReactJs and GCP Cloud Functions, with an average conversion rate of 68%.
Enhanced the leaderboard with a modular, switchable ranking system at runtime, enabling support for 7 additional in-game templates.

projects.name: Link-Tree Application
highlights: This is a Next.js-based application with MongoDB, Express.js, and Node.js, enabling users to create personalised linktrees with 10+ social media plugins.

Introduced shareable public links in Linktree for profile access without authentication.
